TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_bazi', title = bazi', year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/bazi'} }

S.FORM: bazi' baziy請買 →yaya musa su sinkina ga baziy cikay bwax ha... ... mbaziy買 →yaya musa su inu? musa si mbaziy cikay bwax.. ... mtbaziy賣 →nanu cyux su pcwagun? nyux saku mtbaziy qwau na tayal.. ... sptbaziy賣掉→yaqix qu turaq qani la, sptbaziy maku ki plmujan, aki kya cika pila bbazi mu ramat.. ....

bazi' baziy請買 →yaya mosa so sinkina ga baziy cikay bwax ha... ... mbaziy買 →yaya mosa so ino? mosa si mbaziy cikay bwax.. ... mtbaziy賣 →nano cyox so pcwagon? nyox sako mtbaziy qwao na tayal.. ... sptbaziy賣掉→yaqix qo toraq qani la, sptbaziy mako ki plmojan, aki kya cika pila bbazi mo ramat.. ....
